name: Peeping Tom
preparation:
Peeps, those oddly addictive marshmallow candies that look like conjoined chicks with a staring problem, are usually the last thing left in the Easter basket. This holiday, turn them into a cocktail garnish with this festive riff on the Aviation.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled.

Strain into a coupe.

Garnish with 2 Peeps marshmallow candies.
